q_ch: 在我们的所有仓库中，库存不为0的原材料有哪些，整理成{类型：剩余数量}的形式。
q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?

steps.sql: SELECT m.name, wm.left_number FROM materials m JOIN warehouse_material wm ON m.id = wm.material_id WHERE wm.left_number > 0;
steps.description: Retrieve the material names and remaining quantities from all warehouses where the remaining quantity is non-zero

response:
Certainly! Here is the answer to your question:

| Type                  | Remaining Quantity |
|-----------------------|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric         | 3500               |
| Fabric Pieces         | 3200               |
| Wool                  | 4100               |
| Wool Pieces           | 3550               |
| Silk                  | 1100               |
| Silk Pieces           | 5400               |
| Leather               | 2200               |
| Leather Pieces        | 1300               |
| Synthetic Fiber       | 2300               |
| Synthetic Fiber Pieces| 1500               |
| Denim Fabric          | 4500               |
| Denim Fabric Pieces   | 3180               |
| Down                  | 1230               |
| Down Pieces           | 2420               |

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😄
